Declined Ringing… Call Ended Error Select Import Export Abort Rename Replace Save Add Remove Contacts History App Version: App Info: Meshenger app allows voice and video communication without any server or Internet access. Simply scan each others contact QR-Code and call each other. This works on most networks, e.g. at home, in community networks or at work. Address Management QR-Code Address List Currently Active Select one address or more that will be included in your QR-Code. A good idea is to use the MAC address of the WiFi adapter (wlan0). But be aware that it is bound to the hardware of your device. If no MAC address is visible, then enable your WiFi. Listen for incoming calls.
